message: Who would be interested in starting a scikits.nuke project that would handle nuclear engineering and physics code in Python?  What do people have out there that they can contribute?  What sub-packages would we need to have?
What algorithms you want to put in scikits.nuke or what specific problems you want to solve with it?
@yungyuc Different methods of neutron transport, cross section libraries, a standard way of representing isotope names, burnup-depeltion calculations, a mass stream object.
@scopatz Now I realize I know nothing about nuclear engineering.
A group of us have started up this project (now called PyNE) over at https://convore.com/pyne/
Let us know if you want to be involved!
